  • 4.37. umbra.reporter

4.37. umbra.reporter¶

reporter.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines the Reporter class and various others exceptions handling related objects.

Others:

4.37.1. Module Attributes¶

umbra.reporter.LOGGER¶
umbra.reporter.UI_FILE¶
